DOC.brief_summary: The ANTHEM-HF Study is designed to demonstrate the safety and efficacy of vagus nerve stimulation (VNS) with the Cyberonics VNS Therapy System for the treatment of subjects with symptomatic heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Autonomic Neural Regulation Therapy to Enhance Myocardial Function in Heart Failure (ANTHEM-HF) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Heart failure patients will be enrolled and randomized to cervical VNS implantation on either the left side or right side. After a 2-week post-implantation recovery period and a 10-week stimulation titration period, continuous periodic stimulation will be performed for 6 months, with data collection at 3 months and 6 months.
DOC.criteria: Patients with symptomatic heart failure, New York Heart Association (NYHA) class II/III with reduced EF and dilated hearts
